source: Sports Betting Steam Move Research (VSiN, Sports Insights)
title: Steam Move / Cascade Detection
mechanism: A 'steam move' occurs when many trades hit in rapid succession in the same direction, causing sudden price movement. This indicates coordinated sharp action. In Kalshi, can we detect 'bursts' of same-direction trades that predict outcomes?

proposed_signal.condition: 5+ trades in same direction within 60 seconds, causing >5c price move

price_proxy_risk: MEDIUM - involves price change, but measures velocity/coordination
novelty_vs_tested: H088 tested millisecond bursts but focused on NO consensus. This tests directional steam with price impact
